Text.Page:
The argons tested indoctrination methods here—or so we've figured out from the machinery around Raga Kabash.

If we're going to counter argon indoctrination, we need to know how they do it.

The Lokian slayers are the key. They're intact, so they might have some samples—fluids, devices, or whatever—of the latest argon techniques.

Now that we know what they use to indoctrinate their victims, we're one step closer to countering it.

If it's possible, go downstairs and tell Nevian what we've found. He could use some good news.
Slay the slayers and score me some samples. Huh. Try saying that five times fast.
I'm glad things are going so great for Beranie, but we're not exactly productive here.
